title: The Death of Henry Cavill's Superman | The Significance of Superman in the Snyderverse & DCEU
description:
With Henry Cavill's announcement that WB & James Gunn are moving on from his portrayal of Superman, it's an appropriate time to reflect on some of the symbolic significance of his particular portrayal of the character in Zack Snyder's "Snyderverse."

If you'd like more of these kinds of videos please like, subscribe, and let me know in the comments.

#superman #snyderverse #snydercut #henrycavillsuperman #dceu    #jamesgunn 

To support this channel and the Deep Talks podcast:
https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast

Purchase my debut book on the Problem of Evil:
https://www.amazon.com/Dis-Ordered-Christian-Journey-Through-Suffering/dp/B0BBYBWWXR
_______________________________
